item.title: 亚马逊称基于 Nvidia 的新系统要到 2025 年才能上线
item.description: 全球最大的云计算服务提供商亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc）旗下的亚马逊网络服务公司（Amazon Web Services）表示，运行Nvidia公司Blackwell芯片的新系统可能要到明年年初才能上线，这比原先预计的时间要晚。【原文：Amazon.com Inc.’s Amazon Web Services, the world’s biggest cloud-computing provider, said that new systems running Nvidia Corp.’s Blackwell chips probably won’t be online until early next year, a later timeline than originally anticipated.】

item.title: Cboe 首席执行官称公司仍希望以 "合适的价格 "进行交易
item.description: Cboe Global Markets Inc.首席执行官弗雷德-托姆丘克（Fred Tomczyk）表示，如果有合适的机会，该公司仍然愿意进行交易。【原文：Cboe Global Markets Inc. Chief Executive Officer Fred Tomczyk said the firm still has appetite to do deals if the right opportunity emerges.】

item.title: SEC X 账户涉嫌黑客因发布虚假比特币 ETF 消息被捕
item.description: 在美国证券交易委员会就批准现货比特币交易所交易基金做出备受瞩目的决定之前，一名阿拉巴马州男子因 1 月份黑客攻击美国证券交易委员会的 X 账户而受到指控。【原文：An Alabama man has been charged over the January hack of the US Securities and Exchange Commission’s X account ahead of it’s highly anticipated decision on approving a spot-Bitcoin exchange traded fund.】

item.title: 中国市场恶化，依视路销售额略有下滑
item.description: EssilorLuxottica SA 第三季度营收略低于预期，原因是北美太阳镜市场表现不佳以及中国经济状况恶化。【原文：EssilorLuxottica SA’s third-quarter revenue slightly missed estimates on the back of a negative performance from sunglasses in North America and worsening economic conditions in China.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率跃升至 8 月底以来最高水平
item.description: 美国的抵押贷款利率连续第三周上升，攀升至 8 月底以来的最高水平。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US rose for the third week in a row, climbing to the highest level since late August.】

item.title: 欧洲央行官员认为随着 2% 目标的临近，12 月减息的可能性很大
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，欧洲央行官员认为，由于通胀率将以比预期更快的速度稳定在 2% 的水平，12 月份再次降息的可能性很大。【原文：European Central Bank officials reckon another interest-rate cut in December is highly likely, with inflation to settle at 2% faster than envisaged, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 物价上涨和中东危机引发谨慎情绪，埃及维持利率不变
item.description: 埃及将利率维持在创纪录的高位，以应对出乎意料的通胀攀升和对中东地区更广泛冲突的担忧。【原文：Egypt kept interest rates at a record high as it contends with an unexpected climb in inflation and fears of a wider conflict in the Middle East.】

item.title: 即使竞争对手纷纷涌入，EQT 也未受私人信贷热潮影响
item.description: 私人信贷热潮席卷了资产管理行业，并掀起了一股整合浪潮，但这股热潮尚未说服 EQT AB 加入其中，作为欧洲最大的投资公司之一，EQT AB 仍满足于袖手旁观。【原文：The private credit craze that has gripped the asset management industry and set off a wave of consolidation is yet to convince EQT AB to join the fray, with the investment firm, one of the largest in Europe, content to sit on the sidelines.】

item.title: 联合国驻黎巴嫩南部维和人员为何遭到炮火袭击
item.description: 自1978年以来，联合国维和人员一直部署在黎巴嫩南部，当时以色列首次入侵其北部邻国，追击从那里袭击以色列的武装分子。以色列仍在与驻扎在黎巴嫩南部的武装分子作战，尽管是不同的武装分子，联合国部队仍驻扎在那里，但他们恢复该地区和平与安全的基本使命仍未完成。在以色列与黎巴嫩真主党之间的新一轮冲突中，维和人员自己也受到了威胁。【原文：United Nations peacekeepers have been deployed in south Lebanon since 1978, when Israel first invaded its northern neighbor in pursuit of militants that had attacked it from there. Israel is still battling fighters based in south Lebanon — though different ones — and UN forces are still present, their fundamental mission of restoring peace and security to the area unfulfilled. Amid a new conflagration between Israel and the Lebanese militia Hezbollah, the peacekeepers themselves have come under】

item.title: 意大利财政部长称有资金为减税买单
item.description: 意大利财政部长吉安卡洛-乔盖蒂（Giancarlo Giorgetti）为他的 2025 年预算案进行了辩护，反对立法者提出的他没有足够资金支付所有减税和选举承诺的说法。【原文：Italian Finance Minister Giancarlo Giorgetti defended his 2025 budget against lawmakers’ suggestions that he doesn’t have the funds to cover all the tax reductions and election pledges it contains.】

item.title: 美国电力需求意外激增引人将其与二战时期相提并论
item.description: 据能源咨询公司伍德麦肯兹（Wood Mackenzie）称，美国的电力需求将在数十年来首次飙升，在未来五年内，一些地区的电力需求增长将高达 15%。【原文：Electricity demand in the US is set to soar for the first time in decades, with growth as high as 15% in some regions over the next five years, according to energy consultancy Wood Mackenzie.】

item.title: 墨西哥通过能源法案加强国家对 Pemex 和 CFE 的控制
item.description: 墨西哥参议院批准了一项法案，将赋予总统克劳迪娅-谢因鲍姆对国有能源公司更多的控制权，扩大了政府作为该国能源行业最大参与者的作用。【原文：Mexico’s Senate approved a bill that will hand President Claudia Sheinbaum more control over state energy companies, expanding the government’s role as the country’s largest player in the sector.】

item.title: 埃尔-埃里安称，市场对欧洲央行和美联储同步缩表的看法是错误的
item.description: 剑桥大学皇后学院（Queens' College）院长穆罕默德-埃里安（Mohamed El-Erian）认为，投资者对欧洲央行将像美联储那样降低利率的前景进行了错误定价。【原文：Investors are mispricing the prospect that the European Central Bank will lower interest rates as much as the Federal Reserve, according to Mohamed El-Erian, the president of Queens’ College, Cambridge.】

item.title: 也门胡塞叛军对以色列构成什么威胁？
item.description: 10 月以色列与被美国和欧盟认定为恐怖组织的伊斯兰组织哈马斯爆发战争后不久，控制也门西北部的胡塞叛军也加入了战争。胡塞叛军与哈马斯一样敌视以色列，并得到伊朗的支持，他们开始袭击红海的船只，扰乱红海的交通，激起了美国和英国领导的军事反击。叛军还开始向以色列发射导弹和无人机，而以色列与也门相距约 1 公里、【原文：Soon after war broke out in October between Israel and Hamas, the Islamist group designated a terrorist organization by the US and European Union, the Houthi rebels who control northwestern Yemen joined in. The Houthis, who like Hamas are hostile to Israel and backed by Iran, began disrupting traffic in the Red Sea by attacking ships there, provoking a military response led by the US and UK. The rebels also started flinging missiles and drones at Israel, which is separated from Yemen by about 1,】

item.title: 南非市值 1690 亿美元的基金管理公司正在寻找新首席执行官
item.description: 管理着 3 万亿兰特（约合 1,690 亿美元）资产的南非公共投资公司表示，由于现任首席执行官将于明年退休，该公司正在寻找一位首席执行官。【原文：South Africa’s Public Investment Corp., which manages 3 trillion rand ($169 billion) of assets, says it’s seeking a chief executive officer with the incumbent poised to retire next year.】

item.title: 据说法国巴黎银行将裁减新兴市场信贷团队的四名成员
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，法国巴黎银行在扩大新兴市场业务仅两年后，就从其新兴市场信贷团队中裁员至少四人。【原文：BNP Paribas laid off at least four people from its emerging-markets credit team just two years after the bank expanded its presence in the space, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: MUFG 支持的贷款机构及其他机构被禁止在印度发放贷款
item.description: 印度央行周四要求四家影子银行停止发放新贷款，因为它们向客户收取高利率。【原文：India’s central bank on Thursday asked four shadow bankers to stop sanctioning new loans because of high interest rates being charged to customers.】

item.title: 乌克兰将从捷克领导的联盟获得更多火炮弹药
item.description: 乌克兰明年将从捷克共和国组织的一项倡议中获得更多重型弹药，该倡议呼吁盟国提供更多资金。【原文：Ukraine will next year receive more heavy ammunition from an initiative organized by the Czech Republic, which called on allies to provide further funding.】

item.title: 经济徘徊不前，交易员认为欧洲央行有可能降息半点
item.description: 欧洲央行（European Central Bank）的决策者们在周四降低借贷成本时指出了经济增长面临的风险，此后，交易员们加大了对欧洲央行需要在12月份大幅降息的押注。【原文：Traders are adding to bets that the European Central Bank will need a bumper interest-rate cut in December after policymakers flagged risks to growth as they lowered borrowing costs on Thursday.】

item.title: 城市期待人工智能标记居民的垃圾和回收错误
item.description:
密歇根州和加拿大艾伯塔省的一些地方正在使用摄像头来唤醒那些将错误物品放入回收或堆肥桶的人们。【原文：

Localities in Michigan and Alberta, Canada, are using cameras to call out people who put the wrong items in the recycling or compost bin.

】

item.title: 中国 ETF 与凯茜-伍德基金一起成为美国最大的财富破坏者
item.description: 对于那些前所未有地将数十亿资金投入中国股票 ETF 的交易者来说，有一句话要提醒他们：这种策略不仅容易出现大的反转，而且在过去十年里还让一批生不逢时的投资者损失惨重。【原文：A word of warning for traders who’ve been pouring billions into Chinese-stock ETFs like never before: The strategy is not only prone to big reversals, it has also lost a cohort of ill-timed investors a fortune over the past decade and counting.】

item.title: 展望 2025 年，美国住宅建筑商信心指数创四个月新高
item.description: 本月美国住宅建筑商的情绪跃升至四个月来的最高点，抵押贷款利率降低的前景助长了对来年新房需求的乐观情绪。【原文：Sentiment among US home builders jumped to a four-month high this month, with the prospect of lower mortgage rates fueling optimism about demand for new houses in the coming year.】

item.title: 首席执行官表示，随着中东地区销售的蓬勃发展，SolarWinds 计划在利雅得设立办事处
item.description: SolarWinds Corp. 首席执行官 Sudhakar Ramakrishna 表示，随着中东地区业务的快速增长，SolarWinds Corp. 计划明年在沙特阿拉伯首都利雅得开设办事处。【原文：SolarWinds Corp. plans to open an office in Riyadh, the capital of Saudi Arabia, next year as its business in the Middle East grows rapidly, according to Chief Executive Officer Sudhakar Ramakrishna.】

item.title: 银湖与 GIC 达成 17 亿美元收购软件公司 Zuora 的协议
item.description: 银湖管理公司（Silver Lake Management）和新加坡 GIC 私人有限公司（GIC Pte）已同意收购 Zuora 公司，交易价值为 17 亿美元。【原文：Silver Lake Management and Singapore’s GIC Pte have agreed to acquire Zuora Inc. in a deal that values the software maker at $1.7 billion.】

item.title: 在绿色和平组织的故乡，不列颠哥伦比亚省的气候目标面临选举逆流
item.description: 这位加拿大第三大省的政治新贵因对气候科学持怀疑态度而被原党派开除，但他承诺放弃环保目标，放开自然资源开发，赢得政权指日可待。【原文：An unlikely political upstart in Canada’s third-largest province, expelled from his previous party for climate science skepticism, is within striking distance of winning power with promises to ditch environmental targets and unleash natural-resources development.】

item.title: 数据强劲令美联储降息存疑，国债收益率攀升
item.description: 在强劲的 9 月份零售销售数据引发人们对美联储将以多快的速度继续降息的疑虑之后，美国政府债券大幅下滑。【原文：US government bonds slumped after strong September retail-sales figures fanned doubts over how quickly the Federal Reserve will continue to lower interest rates.】

item.title: Zelle 称今年上半年汇款业务猛增 27
item.description: 点对点汇款应用 Zelle 称，今年上半年网络交易额猛增 27%，支付总额接近 5000 亿美元。【原文：Zelle, the peer-to-peer money transfer app, said network transactions jumped 27% during the first half of the year, with payments totaling almost $500 billion.】

item.title: 马斯克用视频反击特斯拉机器人的反击，声称取得了进步
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc. ）在上周的一次活动中，通过一段视频展示了其机器人原型在自行移动方面取得的进展，以此回应外界对其机器人依赖远程人类操作员的批评。【原文：Tesla Inc. responded to blowback over its robots relying on remote human operators at an event last week with a video demonstrating the progress its prototypes are making in moving around on their own.】

item.title: PAI Partners 拟提高对赛诺菲消费品部门的收购报价
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，PAI Partners 已提交了一份对赛诺菲消费保健业务的改进报价，这可能是今年欧洲最大交易之一的一个转折点。【原文：PAI Partners has submitted an improved offer for Sanofi’s consumer health business, according to people familiar with the matter, a potential twist to one of the biggest deals in Europe this year.】

item.title: 日元跌至 150 点关键水平，引发更多干预风险
item.description: 日元汇率下滑，触及 1 美元兑 150 日元的关键心理价位，使日本采取干预措施的风险再次成为焦点。【原文：The yen slid to touch the key psychological level of 150 per dollar, bringing the risk of intervention by Japan back into focus.】
